name: Gabrielle Essence Eau De Parfume
description: A floral, solar and voluptuous interpretation composed by Olivier Polge, Perfumer-Creator for the House of CHANEL.

name: Bleu De Channel
description: An aromatic, woody and fresh fragrance for men with notes of citrus, wood, and ginger.

name: Channel No. 5
description: A classic floral and powdery fragrance with notes of jasmine, rose, and ylang-ylang.

name: Coco Chanel
description: An oriental and spicy fragrance with notes of coriander, cloves, and vanilla.

name: Miu Miu Eau De Parfume
description: A floral and fruity fragrance with notes of lily of the valley, jasmine, and musk.

name: Miss Dior Eau De Parfume
description: A modern, daring and elegant floral fragrance with a hint of jasmine.

name: Nina Ricci L'Extase Eau De Parfume
description: An addictive floral, woody and musky fragrance with a touch of pink pepper.

name: Chloé Eau De Toilette
description: A fresh and romantic fragrance with a delicate blend of peony and lychee.

name: Gucci Bloom Acqua Di Fiori
description: A vibrant and joyful fragrance with a blend of galbanum, jasmine and musk.
